snippet: Drum and bass duo Sigma topped the British music singles chart on Sunday with their track "Changing" featuring soul singer Paloma Faith, the Official Charts Company said....

headline.print_headline: Sigma Top British Singles Chart for Second Time This Year
headline.main: Sigma Top British Singles Chart for Second Time This Year

lead_paragraph: Drum and bass duo Sigma topped the British music singles chart on Sunday with their track "Changing" featuring soul singer Paloma Faith, the Official Charts Company said.
